item.title: About
item.description: A fan of coding, gaming and synthesizers. This site will contain notes about things I am currently working on, or thoughts about things I worked on in the past with no particular theme.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Michael W. Eder http://mikeder.net https://github.com/mikeder emailme@mikeder.net Work Experience Tech Lead Staff Engineer / Commerce & Identity, Bethesda.net Aug. 2019 - Current Tech lead for excavate team that migrated 300k+ BNET accounts, games, and wallets to STEAM. Lead Golang language migration effort for E-Commerce team. Provide end-to-end gRPC and REST microservice implementations. Work closely with in-house and contract engineers to promote development and engineering best practices. SRE Lead / Live Engineering, Bethesda.
